data.name: Backyard Pirates!
data.detailed_description:
Take an RTS, strip it down to its very core, simplify it even more, add some kids pretending to be pirates trying to finish their pirate ships, and you'll get this cute PvP game, that can also be played alone, to unlock more content and customizables!

- Join these classmates in a Battle against different captains with unique abilities, to take down the Pirate Queen that lives on the last block, on Campaign mode
- Move resources around, colonize islands to generate more, and hire gunmen to watch out for the enemy at every quick round on Vs mode
- River Rapids mode will pit you against other sailors to test your speed
- Try to get to the other side of a hungry kid infested street on Pirahna Creek
